definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: comprehend, contain (NH, Aram. id., measure, measure out, of dry or liquid measure; Syr. Aph. 0akiyl id.; Ar. ka0la measure grain)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. only Is 40:12 [[כָּל בְּשָׁלִשׁ]]…[[מִי]] [[עֲפַר הָאָרֶץ]] who hath comprehended the dust of the earth in a shalish-measure?

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[כִּלְכֵּל]] 2Sa 19:33; sf. [[כִּלְכְּלָם]] 1Ki 18:4; 2 ms. sf. [[כִּלְכַּלְתָּם]] Ne 9:21, etc.; Impf. [[יְכַלְכֵּל]] Zec 11:16 +, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[כַּלְכֵּל]] Je 20:9 +, etc.; Pt. [[מְכַלְכֵּל]] Mal 3:2; —sustain, maintain, contain:

sustain, support, nourish, sq. acc. pers. Ge 45:11, Ge 50:21 (both E), 2Sa 19:33, 2Sa 19:34, 2Sa 20:3, 1Ki 4:7 a (v:b abs.), 1Ki 5:7, 1Ki 17:4, 1Ki 17:9, Ne 9:21, Ru 4:15, Ps 55:23, Zec 11:16 (of sheep); sq. acc. pers. + rei (food) Ge 47:12 (J), 1Ki 18:4, 1Ki 18:13.
contain, sq. acc. pers. 1Ki 8:27, 2Ch 2:5, 2Ch 6:18 (heavens cannot contain ´[[י]]); hold in, restrain Yahweh's word within one, Je 20:9.
support, endure, sickness [[רוּחַ אִישׁ]] [[מַחֲלֵָהוּ]] ´[[יְכַל]] Pr 18:14, Mal 3:2 (obj. [[אֶת־יוֹם בּוֹאוֹ]]); of sustaining a cause, in court, [[דְּבָרָיו בְּמִשְׁפָּט]] ´[[יְכַל]] Ps 112:5.

definitions.title: Polp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[כָּלְכְּלוּ]] were supplied with food 1Ki 20:27 (Klo prop. [[בַּגִּלְבּׂעַ]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇכִיל]] 1Ki 7:26 + 2 t. etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הָכִיל]] Je 6:11 + 5 t.;—contain, hold, hold in, endure;

contain, sq. acc. (of liquid) 1Ki 7:26, 1Ki 7:38, 2Ch 4:5; in fig. Je 2:13, abs. Ez Eze 23:32; (of burnt-offering) 1Ki 8:64, 2Ch 7:7; hold in (wrath of ´[[י]], obj. not expr., subj. Jeremiah) Je 6:11 (opp. [[שָׁפַח]]).
sustain, endure, sq. acc. Am 7:10, Je 10:10, Joe 2:11.
